I do not recommendFirst order without any issues. I have ordered 2nd time the same order exactly to the same address. When Odred was delayed I have contacted customer service and they have told me that because they are busy with orders there are some delays. They offered me.6 euros. Next day I have recieved call from Poland where is.my billing adress to give full adress as item was printed in Poland instead France as item spposed to France. I have contacted again Customer Service and they assured me that it will be send to Paris not.to Poland. At the end I recieved it to polish adress where it was picked up.by my mother atnit supposed to be her christmass gift. (6th of December). The have send me just appologize and that is it.
